text: hananim-i moseege seoleun bam-eul yagsoghago geogie yeolheul-eul deoha yeo sasib-il-eul chaewoss-euni junimgwaui gyohwaga sasib-illo kkeutnassdeola geuligo moseneun hyeongje alon-ege illeogalodoe jeoleul daelihayeo jeoui baegseong-eul daseu lyeo gyohwahayeo jugo ag-eul haenghaneun ja deul-ui gil-eul ttaleuji masoseo
